body_html: I don't think we should add any additional functionality to nn.Sequential (we've probably should have only created nn.ModuleList), I think what @vlasenkov proposes is reasonable, but it's hard to get it right. For example your implementation assumes it works with LSTM-like modules that return a tuple of (output, state), but regular RNNs return just a single value that is both. I think we should also finally resolve #711
